company.tagline: Go to market with unique data—and the ability to act on it
company.description: We make creative tools to help people grow their businesses. We help teams get the best data foundation possible to reach their best-fit customers. We care about helping people grow businesses: whether taking a solo dream to a small team or scaling a mature enterprise company.

funding_rounds.source: Clay Series C announcement. The GTM engineering era begins now

events.title: Clay Series C announcement
events.description: We raised a $100M Series C at a $3.1B valuation to power GTM engineering!

events.title: Announcing Web Intent
events.description: Use Website Intent in Clay to see which companies visit your site, track engagement, and trigger personalized GTM plays.

events.title: Introducing Bulk Enrichment
events.description: Clay’s Bulk Enrichment lets Enterprise teams enrich millions of Salesforce records with firmographics, tech stack data, and AI research at scale.

events.title: Introducing Claygent Navigator
events.description: A new Claygent model that can use a browser to take actions and extract information from webpages.

events.title: Introducing GPT-5 in Claygent
events.description: GPT-5 is now a model option across Clay, enhancing research and conversational writing capabilities.

events.title: Claygent surpasses 1 billion runs
events.description: The world's most loved AI research agent in GTM has surpassed a huge milestone at 1 billion runs.

events.title: Announcing the Clay Partner Program
events.description: The Clay Partner Program is designed to provide essential resources for partners to grow their businesses as Clay grows.

events.title: Announcing custom signals at Clay
events.description: Clay's new platform helps sales teams track unique data changes indicating buying opportunities and automate outreach.

events.title: Create personalized presentations at scale with Clay and Google Slides
events.description: Automate personalized sales decks using Clay’s Google Slides integration to generate tailored presentations at scale.

events.title: Turn Gong conversations into automated GTM workflows
events.description: Clay integrates with Gong, allowing messy call transcripts to be used for automations in various platforms.

funding_rounds.source: Clay Series C announcement. The GTM engineering era begins now
